channel.title: Apply on complex play lab
channel.description: Recent content in Apply on complex play lab

item.title: Apply for the Master's Program in Design, Informal, and Creative Education
item.description:
Apply to our M.S. Program in Design, Informal, and Creative Education in the Department of Curriculum & Instruction at UW–Madison! Our department has been ranked #1 17 of the last 20 years running.

The DICE program includes the UW–Madison Games Program, also directed by Prof. Berland.

More information here.

item.title: Apply to the Ph.D. Program in Design, Informal, and Creative Education
item.description:
Apply to our Ph.D. Program in Design, Informal, and Creative Education in the Department of Curriculum & Instruction at UW–Madison! Our department has been ranked #1 17 of the last 20 years running. Ph.D. students are guaranteed full funding, including tuition, stipend, and health insurance if admitted.

The DICE program includes the UW–Madison Games Program, also directed by Prof. Berland.

More information here.
